info.title: Digital.gov Content API
info.description: The Digital.gov Content API provides machine-readable access to all of the content that makes up digital.gov.

get.summary: A list of all the sections in Digital.gov
get.description: Returns list of all the sections in Digital.gov

get.summary: A list of all the digital.gov news and blog posts.
get.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov news and blog posts.

200.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov news and blog posts.

get.summary: A list of all the digital.gov events.
get.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov events.

200.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov events.

get.summary: A list of all the digital.gov communities.
get.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov communities.

200.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov communities.

get.summary: All guides and resources on Digital.gov
get.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov resource pages

200.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov resource pages

get.summary: All tools and services on Digital.gov
get.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov tools and services pages

200.description: Returns a list of all the digital.gov tools and services pages
